shortdesc.p: A wise man once said, "All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast." These detailed topics will show all the tools and ingredients needed to make a grand slam breakfast!
Helpful tips as you prepare to make breakfast
Deciding what day to dedicate to making a wonderfully big and yummy breakfast
Use these websites to find recipes

topic.title: A trip to Whole Foods and Trader Joes

shortdesc.p: Can you name two better food stores to drop some money at for breakfast... Maybe you can, but I sure can't! Whole Foods and Trader Joes have taken the health food store market by storm. They offer delicious food choices that are good for your health and your taste buds! In order to make your breakfast you should take a trip to these stores to get needed ingredients.
Dirty Kitchen? Clean it up! A key factor that will make this breakfast enjoyable is having a clean kitchen to work with.
All of these yummy recipes will be sure to make your taste buds very happy!.
Coffee is the perfect pairing with any breakfast meal
Below is a wonderfully delicious recipe for Banana Bread Flap Jacks

I don't think I can go a day without eating something that has avocado in it or on it. Avocados have become such a fad, everyone loves them. This recipe is to die for and needs to be included in your brunch!

topic.title: Sun-Dried Tomato, Mushroom, And Spinach Quiche

shortdesc.p: Quiche is one of the most underrated breakfast dishes. There are so many toppings that can be added to create a breakfast master piece. This easy to follow recipe will be a crowd pleaser for all.
Did you ever think of making tator tots for breakfast? Now is your chance to swap out hash browns for tator tots!
The last steps before you eat!
Set the mood by setting the table
As much as you don't want to, you'll have to clean up the kitchen.
Helpful tips and tricks as you finish breakfast
